Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: So, yes, if you are unaccustomed to eating to satiety...feeling full can be distressing.  That said, 2000 calories....well, it’s a good bit of food but it’s not going to have a significant impact on your weight. Depending on your stats it may not even be any/much above maintenance. Any one day is nbd.  Tomorrow is a new day. And while my emotional brain tells me I don’t deserve food my logical mind knows I at the very least need some protein for my heart and some fat for vitamin absorption.
